overview: This performance from pianist Samson Francois has been deftly restored and features Francois playing masterfully on two pieces: Ravel's "Concerto for the Left Hand" and Grieg's "Piano Concerto in A Minor." Also look for bonus material including supplementary pieces such as "Chopin's 3 Preludes (F-Sharp Minor, G Minor & D Minor)."
title: Samson Francois
